claim: A photograph shows microplankton and other organisms found in a single drop of seawater magnified 25 times.
Populations of wild deer across North America have tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 antibodies.
Red Bull and Bang energy drinks test positive for various illicit or prescription drugs in substance or urine tests
The macaw species from the “Rio” movies has been declared extinct in the wild.
Sniffing rosemary increases human memory by up to 75 percent.
"Rocks falling into the ocean" is a factor that contributes to observable sea level rise on human time scales.
Every cell in the human body is replaced every seven years.
A study showed that dogs could show jealousy if they caught their owners behaving sweetly toward other dogs.
Eating alligator in New Orleans will help save the wetlands of Louisiana.
Using toilet paper as a barrier between your derriere and a toilet seat poses more health risks than just sitting down without a barrier.
Left-handed people, on average, die younger than right-handed people.
Placing a raw, cut onion in contact with your foot overnight “purifies your blood”, removes “toxins”, and heals your body.
Cancer is caused by a deficiency of vitamin “B17,” a condition that can be remedied with nutritional supplements.
Peanut butter can be used to diagnose Alzheimer’s Disease.
During pregnancy, if the mother suffers organ damage, the baby in the womb sends stem cells to repair the damaged organ.
Scientific studies support the conclusion that marijuana can play a role in healing broken bones.
Time itself is speeding up and we actually perceive a 24-hour day as a 16-hour day.
NASA will launch naked pictures of humans into space in hopes of “attracting aliens.”
A viral image shows how grains of salt look under a microscope.
Researchers at Ben-Gurion University in Israel taught goldfish to steer a specially designed "fish-operated vehicle" to get food.

More than 20 African countries banded together to combat the spread of the Sahara Desert by planting a giant wall of trees to run across the continent. This wall will stretch for around 7,000 km coast to coast.
In 2021, Guinness World Records named paint developed by researchers at Purdue University the world's whitest.
A video filmed at the microscopic level shows a nanobot as it “picks up a lazy sperm by the tail and inseminates an egg with it.”
An inaudible sonic weapon adequately explains the "Havana Syndrome," a range of symptoms experienced by diplomats suffering from “health attacks” in Cuba.
A 2007 study showed burning sage kills 94% of bacteria.
A photograph shows one petri dish that was coughed on by a person not wearing a mask and another petri dish coughed on by the same person wearing a mask.
NASA "admitted" that climate change occurs naturally as a result of changes in Earth's solar orbit and not anthropogenic factors.
Researchers detected cocaine in multiple, freshwater-shrimp samples across the U.K.
A list of chemicals, written as if they were ingredients on a food label, accurately depicts the chemical composition of a banana
A scientific study demonstrated that conspiracy theorists are generally more sane than other people.
Scientific data has linked the surge in volcanic activity in Hawaii to increased fracking activity from a nearby geothermal energy plant.
NASA has recently confirmed the existence of Earth’s second moon.
Recently discovered satellite photos from Google Earth show that an ancient civilization built pyramids in Antarctica 100 million years ago.
A viral animation shows a myosin molecule transporting endorphins, which can be thought of as a visual representation of the feeling of happiness.
A peer-reviewed study has found evidence that nearly all of global warming has been fabricated by climate scientists.
An investigation has proven the presence of feces in Starbucks beverages.
A total of 58 peer-reviewed papers published in the first half of 2017 conclude that global warming is a myth.
If the vial to a mercury-containing vaccine is broken, the building must be evacuated.
A study performed at the Los Alamos National Laboratory found that millimeter wave body scanners commonly used by airport security can alter your DNA.
SpaceX will be transporting a potentially deadly pathogen to the International Space Station as part of their next launch.
Studies have proved that having an abortion increases a woman's risk of developing breast cancer.
Close examination of a photograph taken by NASA’s Mars Curiosity Rover shows the presence of a hairy, spider-monkey like creature.
Salt lamps, because they emit negatively charged ions, impart myriad health benefits including reduced anxiety, improved sleep, increased energy, and protection from an “electric smog.”
Women need more sleep than men because their brains get more use on a day-to-day basis.

The United States military recruited Native Americans as scouts in the Vietnam War and — in the course of their training — the military discovered that long hair actually helps give people ‘almost supernatural’ tracking abilities.

A video shows a chimpanzee rapidly memorizing the location of numbers from 1-9 on a touch screen, demonstrating its ability to recall their location by tapping (in sequential order) boxes that covered those numbers after a fraction of a second.
Are vaccinated and boosted people more susceptible to infection or disease with the omicron variant than unvaccinated people?
NASA provided $1.1 million in funding to a religious organization to study how humans may react to life beyond Earth.
Insulin price increases have more to do with increased consumer demand than the bad behavior of Big Pharma
Wearing masks is “COVID theater” and “not doing anything.”
“The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s recent guidance on students and masking “lacks a well-grounded scientific justification.”
"Dandelion root is able to kill 98% of cancer cells within 48 hours."
“For #Covid vaccines, shingles and even more dangerous and painful skin conditions may be the new thrombocytopenia."
“The percentage of Americans with natural immunity from getting COVID-19 is “a very powerful vaccine in itself.”
“If you have the Flu… get these two items… Sambucol (and) Oscillococcinum… in 48 hours you will feel better. In 72 hours you will be almost symptom-free.”
“If you're a black woman, you're 320% more likely to die from complications in childbirth.”
